description: This course enables students to undertake an industry work placement of approximately 100 hours throughout the semester, to gain greater insight into business organisations and the realities of management in organisational settings.
prerequisites: 24 units in BAdvBus(Hons) + permission from Head of School
restricted: Final year students. Course is restricted to students enrolled in the BAdvBus(Hons) program. Quota: Maximum of 30 enrolments.
